gdm 1.5.0
  • Reference

    gdm

    The gdm package provides function to fit, plot, summarize, and apply Generalized Dissimilarity Models.

    Citations

    Fitzpatrick MC, Mokany K, Manion G, Ferrier S. (2021) gdm: Generalized Dissimilarity Modeling. R package version 1.5.0.

    Mokany K, Fitzpatrick MC, Ware C, Woolley SNC, Ferrier S (in revision) A working guide to generalized dissimilarity modelling.

    Ferrier S, Manion G, Elith J, Richardson, K (2007) Using generalized dissimilarity modelling to analyse and predict patterns of beta diversity in regional biodiversity assessment. Diversity & Distributions 13: 252-264.

    Installation

    gdm is available on CRAN, and can be installed using:

    install.packages("gdm")

    Examples

    Forthcoming…
